long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The IXily chrome extension is the fastest way for you to execute trades and manage your portfolio from any website.

The extension also allows you to trigger a trade from any site that supports cashtags i.e. $AAPL or uses supported tickers (currently limited to the top 50 most traded stocks). 

Simply click on any cashtag or highlighted ticker/company name and this will launch a trade order ticket for that asset, and which allows you to then place an order in your linked brokerage account.

Configure your trade orders or review and manage your portfolio, all without leaving the site you were on.
